resources.string: ex. Epiphone\'s number one selling model LP Special II is a great way for beginners to get started on guitar while getting the feel and tone of a Les Paul. Seasoned pros also love the Special II because it\'s a great-sounding workhorse of a guitar that allows them to leave their more expensive axes at home.
Review items proposed by other users.
Review this item by either approving or rejecting it.
Approve items if you know they exist in the specified place. Reject items if you know they do not exist.

The item you\'ve just scanned does not exist in the Itemfinder database. If you\'d like to add this item to the database, fill in some details in the below fields. Newly added items are submitted for review by other users and are approved once enough users have approved it. To increase the chance of approving this item, include as much accurate information as possible in the description.
Not finding an item to add? You can add a new item by scanning its barcode. You can also scan the barcode to find an already existing item.
Sorry, the barcode search encountered a problem.
Not finding your place? Propose a new one by clicking the button on the toolbar.

This item was already submitted by another user in this place

An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
The type of this item is not supported
To check whether this is a new item, an Internet connection is required.
To check if this item already exists, or it has been submitted by another user, an Internet connection is required.
Unknown location address. If you know a place in this location that has the item, consider adding the place from the menu action above.
The type of this place is not supported. Please select a different place.
The type of this place is not supported for the selected item. Please select a different place.

Itemfinder\'s location and mapping features rely on Google Maps and its Places database. If a place you know has a certain item and is not found in Itemfinder, you can add it if you have enough reputation. The newly-added place will be available in Itemfinder after a short time, and is added to a moderation queue for possible addition to Google\'s Places database and Google Maps.
You should provide either a phone number or a website URI, or both.

There are no saved locations. To save a location for offline use, tap the button below.

You can add or remove locations that you would like to save for quickly adding items. The preferred locations among these will also be used to display the item locations on a map in case location settings are disabled on your phone.
There are no favorite items. You can add a favorite by tapping the button when viewing an item.
Add items to your favorite list to make it faster to find them. When you start Itemfinder, it will play a sound if any of the favorite items is found in your vicinity.
